A toxicology screen is a group of tests that shows which medicines and drugs you've taken and how much of them you've taken. A blood or urine sample usually is collected for a toxicology screen.",NHLBI,Obesity Hypoventilation Syndrome
What are the treatments for Obesity Hypoventilation Syndrome ?,"Treatments for obesity hypoventilation syndrome (OHS) include breathing support, weight loss, and medicines.
